full_description:
Asus P3B Mini LED 800 Lumen Multimedia Projector

  • 800-lumen long-life LED light source for best-in-class HD visuals.
  • Ultra-short-throw lens for projected images measuring from 25in (0.45m) to 200in (3.4m ).
  • Built-in 12,000mAh battery provides up to 3 hours of projection time and doubles as a power bank for mobile devices.
  • ASUS Wi-Fi Projection for wireless presentations and media streaming.
  • Contrast Ratio: 100000:1
  • Project content from various devices via HDMI/MHL or VGA, from a USB drive, from a microSD memory card (up to 32GB), or from the onboard storage.
  • PC-Free Office Viewer and Multimedia Playback to project videos, photos, or music.

2 Years Warranty

title: Asus ZenBeam S2 500 Lumens Portable LED Projector
cat_seo_title: Asus Projector Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Asus Projectors at best price in Bangladesh. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
Asus ZenBeam S2 500 Lumens Portable LED Projector

Asus ZenBeam S2 Portable Projector is designed with 500 lumens light output with 1280x720 (HD) native resolution. It has a USB-C connectivity feature and a Built-in 6000mAh Battery. This portable projector has auto focus and 2D Keystone adjustment with Corner Correction. Asus ZenBeam S2 Portable Projector offers a comprehensive set of connectivity like USB-C (signal input and power delivery), USB output, wireless mirroring, and HDMI.

Bright and Crisp 120-inch Projections

ZenBeam S2 with 500-lumen light output and HD 1280 x 720 resolution with 100% NTSC color space coverage it can provide crisp and bright images. Maximize big-screen thrills in minimum space with short-throw that require as little as 40 inches (1m) to project stunning 120-inch (3m) images.

Built-in 6000mAh Long-Lasting Battery

ZenBeam S2 portable projector features a built-in 6000mAh battery that delivers up to 3.5 hours of operation on a single charge, plenty of time for even the longest presentations and movies. The battery and built-in USB-A port with 5V/1A power output also enable ZenBeam S2 to act as a portable power source for charging a phone or other mobile device.

2D Keystone Correction & Auto Focus

Asus ZenBeam S2 Portable Projector comes with horizontal and automatic vertical keystone adjustments of up to ±30 degrees to correct for trapezoidal distortion that can occur when projecting at an angle. This correction allows the projector to be placed off-center, so presenters can stand in front of the screen without blocking the image. Built-in a focus sensor measuring the distance between the projector and the screen, the ZenBeam S2 can adjust the focus of the projected images automatically. It's perfect to set up easily and quickly in various environments.

Comprehensive USB-C and HDMI Connectivity

ZenBeam S2 LED Portable Projector features USB-C and HDMI ports to provide maximum compatibility with external devices. The reversible USB-C port supports signal and supports 5V/1.5A power output simultaneously via one cable. USB-A also provides 5V/1A power output for device charging.

Built-in Speaker with ASUS SonicMaster Technology

ZenBeam S2 built-in 2W stereo speaker with ASUS SonicMaster certified, developed by the ASUS Golden Ear team, delivers a wider frequency range for clearer vocals and rich, deep bass. SonicMaster is a tailored mix of superior hardware and clever software designed to give you full audio controls for truly immersive sound for movies, music, and games.
